titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Kerry in the case of Beauchamp v. Kerry (Mass. Sup. Ct.).

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 8/9/1988--Introduced. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Kerry in the case of Beauchamp v. Kerry.
